duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop Android apps by converting ideas, designs, and requirements into concrete, stable production builds.
Design and oversee solutions for specific use cases that provide frameworks, interfaces, and services that can be extended and reused for future requirements.
Influence and mentor peers across PayPal.
Collaborate with Engineering and QA to resolve bugs.
Develop and communicate technical processes, standards, and best practices to the team.

education_certification.credential: B.S. or equivalent degree in Computer Science
